    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActiveActor
    The ActiveActor class represents an abstract actor in a graphical application.
    ActiveActorDestructible
    Abstract class representing a destructible active actor.
    ActorManager
    Manager class for handling various actor-related operations such as updating, removing, and managing collisions of actors.
    BackgroundManager
    BackgroundManager is responsible for managing the background image of the game.
    Boss
    The Boss class represents a specialized enemy entity in a game.
    BossHealthManager
    Manages the boss health display, including the health bar and health text.
    BossProjectile
    Represents a projectile used by a boss in the game.
    BoundsHandler
    A utility class for handling and calculating precise bounds of JavaFX ImageView nodes.
    CollisionManager
    Manages collision detection and handling between various game entities such as user planes, friendly units, enemy units, and projectiles.
    Controller
    The Controller class manages the game flow, including transitions between levels, displaying the main menu, and handling errors.
    Destructible
    Represents an entity that can take damage and be destroyed.
    DestructionState
    Represents the state of an entity regarding its destruction status.
    EnemyManager
    Manages a collection of enemy units and their interactions within the game.
    EnemyPlane
    Represents an enemy plane in the game.
    EnemyProjectile
    Represents a projectile fired by an enemy in the game.
    FighterPlane
    Represents an abstract fighter plane in the game.
    GameLoopManager
    Manages the game loop using a JavaFX Timeline.
    GameOverHandler
    Handles the game over scenarios by determining the next steps based on the game state.
    GameOverImage
    Represents the "Game Over" image displayed in the game.
    HealthManager
    The HealthManager class manages the health state of an entity.
    HealthProjectile
    Represents a health projectile in the game.
    HeartDisplay
    Represents a heart display in the game, used to visually indicate the player's health using heart icons.
    ImageHandler
    Provides utility methods for handling images in the application.
    InstructionTextManager
    Manages the instruction text display for the game level.
    KillsRemainingTextManager
    Manages the display and updates of the "Kills Remaining" text in the game.
    LevelOne
    Represents the first level of the game.
    LevelParent
     
    LevelProjectileManager
    Manages projectiles in a level, including user and enemy projectiles.
    LevelThree
    Represents the third level of the game.
    LevelTransitionManager
    Manages level transitions, including displaying messages and triggering callbacks.
    LevelTwo
    Represents the second level of the game.
    LevelView
    Represents the visual components and user interface for a game level.
    LevelViewLevelThree
    Represents the visual components and user interface specific to level three.
    LevelViewLevelTwo
    The LevelViewLevelTwo class represents the second level's visual layout in a game.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the Sky Battle game.
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu interface for the game.
    MainMenuButtonManager
    Manages the Main Menu button for a JavaFX application.
    MovementManager
    The MovementManager class manages movement patterns for game objects.
    PauseManager
    Manages the pause functionality for a game.
    PauseTextManager
    Manages the display of the "Game Paused" text in the game.
    Projectile
    The Projectile class is an abstract representation of a destructible projectile in the game.
    ProjectileManager
    The ProjectileManager class is responsible for managing the firing of projectiles in the game.
    RedScreenEffect
    The RedScreenEffect class provides a red flash effect on the screen.
    SceneManager
    The SceneManager class manages the primary scene and its associated groups, including the root, overlay, and pause overlay groups.
    ShieldImage
    The ShieldImage class represents a shield graphic in the game.
    ShieldManager
    The ShieldManager class handles the activation, positioning, and deactivation of a shield in the game.
    TransitionScreen
    The TransitionScreen class provides a transition screen effect for moving between game levels or scenes.
    UserPlane
    Represents the user's fighter plane in the game.
    UserProjectile
    The UserProjectile class represents a projectile fired by the user plane.
    WinImage
    The WinImage class represents the "You Win" image displayed when the player wins the game.
